content: निषादः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the wild aboriginal tribes in India, such as. hunters, fishermen &c.; a mountaineer; मा निषाद प्रतिष्ठां त्वमगमः शाश्वतीः समाः Rām; <ls>R. 14. 52</ls>, <ls n="R. 14.">70</ls>; <ls>U. 2. 5.</ls> {@--2@} A man of a degraded tribe in general, an outcast, a Cāṇḍāla. {@--3@} Especially, the son of a Brāhmaṇa by a Śūdra woman; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 10. 8.</ls> {@--4@} (In music) The first (more properly the last or seventh) note of the Hindu gamut; गीतकलाविन्यासमिव निषादानुगतं <ls>K. 31</ls> (where it has sense 1 also).
